passives.name: Timeless
passives.effects: This item gains {{as|10 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|30 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|3 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|100 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|300 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|30 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (level cap remains the same).

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 10% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.
